# Bihar Ke Swaad

> Anupama Ke Saath


## Posts

- [Hello world!](https://biharkeswaad.shop/hello-world/): Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start writing!

## Pages

- [RETURNS AND REFUNDS POLICY](https://biharkeswaad.shop/returns-and-refunds-policy/): Returns, Refunds & Cancellations Policy At Bihar Ke Swaad, we take immense pride in preparing each order fresh, on-demand and with personal care. Due to the perishable nature of our food products and the handcrafted process behind every item, we follow a strict no-cancellation, no-return, and no-refund policy. ❌ No Returns or Exchanges ❌ No Refunds or Cancellations ✅ Exceptions – Damaged or Wrong Products In rare cases of: Please notify us within 24 hours of receiving the package, along with: We will review the case and offer a replacement or partial refund if eligible — solely at our discretion. […]
- [SHIPPING POLICY](https://biharkeswaad.shop/shipping-policy/): At Bihar Ke Swaad, we understand the value of timely and safe delivery — especially when it comes to handcrafted food items. We’ve partnered with Shiprocket, one of India’s leading logistics platforms, to ensure your order reaches you fresh and intact. 🚚 Where We Deliver We deliver across pan India, covering most pin codes through trusted courier partners via Shiprocket. ⏱️ Processing & Shipping Time 📦 Packaging ❗ Important Notes 📩 Need Help? If you face any delivery issue or want to track your order, feel free to contact us:📧 Email: support@biharkeswaad.shop📦 Or check the order status from your account […]

If you do not agree with any part of these terms, please do not use our website. 2. Products and Services All products listed on our website are handmade and prepared fresh upon order. As our products are food-based: We reserve the right to discontinue or modify any product at any time without notice. 3. Orders and Payment 4. Shipping and Delivery […]

- [About Us](https://biharkeswaad.shop/about-us/): Our Story What Makes Us Special ❤️ Homemade with LoveWe craft each item—whether it’s Balushahi, Laung Lata, Thekua, or tangy pickles—by hand, in small batches, just like in Indian homes. We never compromise on authenticity or quality.🌱 Fresh & Preservative-FreeMade to order, our products contain no preservatives or artificial colors. They’re as wholesome and fresh as homemade delights should be.🚚 Seamless Delivery with ShiprocketThanks to our integration with Shiprocket, your order arrives quickly and safely—fresh, intact, and ready to savor. Meet Anupama At the heart of this venture is Anupama, whose childhood memories of family feasts and festive cooking imbued a […]
